column1: Use the Tumour, Node, Metastasis (TNM) classification for staging of PCa.

Clinical stage should be based on digital rectal examination (DRE) only; additional staging 
information based on imaging should be reported separately.
Use the International Society of Urological Pathology (ISUP) 2019 system for grading of PCa.  Strong
Use the EAU risk group stratification for prognostic subgrouping of patients.
